mutants.code:
def reformat_string(s):
    s = s.replace('', '')
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join(sorted(s))
    return s

def reformat_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    s = s.lower()
    s = ''.join(sorted(s))
    return s

def reformat_string(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    s = s.lower()
    s = 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(s))
    return s
